ValidationRule.description: An Opportunity cannot be moved to the Qualification stage or any other earlier open stage from a later open stage. Checks if Qualification Date has already been populated as an indicator of having already been qualified.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND(
ISCHANGED(StageName),
OR( TEXT(StageName) = "0 - Generate Interest", TEXT(StageName) = "1 - Qualify Opportunity" ),
NOT(ISBLANK(Qualification_Date__c)),
NOT($User.Admin_Bypass_Validations__c) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The Opportunity has already been Qualified and can no longer be moved to the "Qualification" or "Generate Interest" stages.
